name: Let me fix that for you, Facebook
description:
Latest version (2020) of Facebook is severely bloated. A few minor changes removes the biggest issues. You want to read the feed, and that's the first thing you should notice.

Tested on Firefox and Chrome on Mac.
additional_info: 2023-01-01 • I quit using Facebook, so I wont be updating this style in the future. 2020-10-22 • Refined the modal alignment issue. 2020-09-26 • Fixed issue, on larger screens, where media (images, videos) didn't align to the center when being viewed in a modal. 2020-08-29 • Displays right column when clicking up an image. 2020-08-28 • Removed the right column. • Removed stories at the top • Removed videochat • Increased the width of the feed a bit.
